location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: 'Rough Sketch Showing Dispositions at the Battle of Injair'

physicalDescription.extent: Materials: Manuscript, coloured ink on paper.Dimensions: 200 x 335mm.

mods.abstract: The map shows the primary troop movements and encampments of the Battle of Injair [Abar Nuqayr] that took place on 5 October 1929 between the forces of the Ikhwan and Ibn Sa'ud. The map also identifies the location of the Injair wells and what appear to be two elevated areas.The map is enclosed after an account of the battle written by the Political Agent in Kuwait, Major Harold Richard Patrick Dickson.
